meta.name: Generate Dynamic Sales Pipeline Metrics for Slack using Airtable

parameters.content:
## üì© Weekly Slack Sales Report Automation

Sends a weekly pipeline summary to Slack with real sales metrics like open deals, top deal, win rate, weighted pipeline, and total revenue closed.

üë§ Who It‚Äôs For

Sales managers, founders, and revenue teams who want automatic visibility into deal momentum without checking the CRM.

‚öôÔ∏è How to Set Up
	1.	Connect Airtable and Slack accounts.
	2.	Duplicate this workflow in n8n.
	3.	Set Airtable table + Slack channel in the respective nodes.
	4.	Schedule to run weekly (or trigger manually).

‚úÖ Requirements
	‚Ä¢	Airtable sales pipeline table (with ‚ÄúStatus‚Äù and ‚ÄúValue‚Äù fields)
	‚Ä¢	Slack workspace with webhook or token access
	‚Ä¢	n8n cloud or self-hosted instance

üé® How to Customize
	‚Ä¢	Change the Slack formatting to match your brand voice
	‚Ä¢	Add fields like ‚ÄúDeal Owner‚Äù or ‚ÄúClose Date‚Äù if needed
	‚Ä¢	Modify weighting in Code node if your pipeline uses different stages

**Need Help?**

Join the [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XPKeKXeB7d) or ask in the [Forum](https://community.n8n.io/).

Workflow Breakdown
	1.	Search Airtable for deals marked ‚ÄúWon‚Äù
	2.	Search Airtable again for all other open deals
	3.	Merge results into one array
	4.	Split & summarize in Code Node 1: format Slack message with open/won stats
	5.	Deeper metrics in Code Node 2: weighted pipeline, total revenue
	6.	Send final message to Slack

## Search Open Deals
[Read more about Airtable node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.airtable/)

This node fetches all remaining records in the pipeline that are still active (i.e. any Status that isn‚Äôt ‚ÄúWon‚Äù). These open deals are used to compute total pipeline value, top open deal, and other forward-looking metrics.

## Search Won Deals
[Read more about the Airtable node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.airtable/)

This node queries the Airtable deal table for all records where Status is set to ‚ÄúWon‚Äù. It returns only the successfully closed deals so the report can calculate win rate and total closed revenue.

## Send Slack Message
[Read more about the Slack node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.slack/)

This node takes the formatted message and posts it to the designated Slack channel. It uses the output from both code nodes to send a single message with all the key sales metrics, helping the team stay aligned on pipeline status.

## Process & Format Metrics
[Read more about the Code node](https://www.google.com/search?client=safari&rls=en&q=code+node+n8n&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8)

[Read more about the Merge node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.merge/)

Merges both datasets, splits open vs won deals, calculates total pipeline, weighted pipeline based on stage probabilities, top deal, closed revenue, and win rate, then formats everything into a clean message for Slack.

## Schedule Trigger
[Read more about Calendly Credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/calendly/)

Triggers the workflow on a recurring schedule. You can set it to run as often as you like.
